The Harp Java API

Harp is a collective communication library plugined into Hadoop built by Indiana University.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
edu.iu.harp.client
harp collective communication client
edu.iu.harp.collective
harp collective communication implementations
edu.iu.harp.depl
harp node deployment
edu.iu.harp.example
harp data structure examples
edu.iu.harp.io
Generic i/o code for use
edu.iu.harp.keyval
harp keyval data structure definition
edu.iu.harp.partition
harp partition and table definition
edu.iu.harp.resource
harp resources and data structure definitions
edu.iu.harp.schdynamic
harp dynamic scheduler
edu.iu.harp.schstatic
harp static scheduler
edu.iu.harp.server
harp collective communication server
edu.iu.harp.util
harp utils
edu.iu.harp.worker
harp workers
org.apache.hadoop.mapred
MapCollective interfaces
org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.v2.app
MapCollective Application master
org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.v2.app.launcher
MapCollective container launcher
org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.v2.app.rm
MapCollective resource container allocator

Harp is a collective communication library plugined into Hadoop built by Indiana University.
